Bose Centre for Cryptology and Security                      Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkata                              Email: molla (@isical dot ac dot in)                                   anisurpm (@gmail dot com)I am a faculty member at the Indian Statistical Institute (ISI). I earned my PhD from the School of Physical and Mathematical Sciences at Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. Mathematics Genealogy Project  Google Scholar Citations DBLPResearch Interest:My research interests are in distributed computing and network algorithms. In particular, I am interested in the theory and application of large-scale distributed networks, security in distributed computing, Byzantine computation, distributed computation using mobile agents, distributed processing of big data, design and analysis of distributed and parallel algorithms, randomized algorithms and probabilistic analysis of algorithms.Publications: *Authors' names are in alphabetical order   Journal Papers: Fault-Tolerant Dispersion of Mobile Robots, with Prabhat Kumar Chand, Manish Kumar, Sumathi Sivasubramaniam.
